title: Hydro Flasks on Sale at Backcountry 2019
text:
10 items in this article 10 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of retailer

When it comes to insulated, stainless steel water bottles, Hydro Flasks are top of the line, and right now, there’s a bunch of different styles and colors on sale at Backcountry with the code CLIMBCAMP20. But these water bottles aren’t just for those who climb and camp. Jonah Hill has been known to stay hydrated in the city with the 64-ounce growler (and influenced some of our colleagues at the Cut to do the same), Strategist managing editor Maxine Builder takes her currently-on-sale 32-ounce Hydro Flask to hot yoga, and VSCO Girl attire basically requires a sticker-covered one. Hydro Flasks aren’t just for water, either. This sale includes reusable travel mugs for coffee, growlers for beer, even an insulated wine bottle, along with the classic wide- and standard-mouth water bottles. But don’t dillydally: Certain colors are already starting to sell out.
